  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_109889</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_109889</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Semi-conservative replication of DNA</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Halb-konservative Reproduktion von DNA</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réplique de semi-finale-conservative de l'ADN</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">replication Semi-conservador do DNA</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Replica di Semi-conservatore di DNA</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ημι-συντηρητική αντένσταση του DNA</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">réplica Semi-conservadora de la DNA</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the three methods by which DNA molecules were thought to replicate: (a) the conservative replication, (b) semi-conservative replication and (c) dispersive replication.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">conservative replication</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">dispersive replication</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">DNA</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">semi-conservative replication</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die drei Methoden, durch 
die DNA Moleküle gedacht wurden, um zu wiederholen: (a) die 
konservative Reproduktion, (b) halb-konservative Reproduktion und (c) 
dispersive Reproduktion.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre les trois méthodes par
lesquelles on a pensé des molécules d'ADN pour replier : (a) 
la réplique conservatrice, (b) réplique de semi-finale-conservative et
(c) réplique dispersive.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra os três métodos por 
que as moléculas do DNA foram pensadas para replicate: (a) o 
replication conservador, (b) replication semi-conservador e (c) 
replication dispersive.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra i tre metodi da cui 
le molecole del DNA si sono pensate per ripiegare: (a) la 
replica conservatrice, (b) replica di semi-conservatore e (c) replica 
dispersiva.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τρεις μεθόδους με τις 
οποίες τα μόρια DNA θεωρήθηκαν για να ξαναδιπλώσουν: (α) 
η συντηρητική αντένσταση, (β) ημι-συντηρητική αντένσταση και (γ) 
διασποράς αντένσταση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra los tres métodos por 
los cuales las moléculas de la DNA fueron pensadas para replegar: 
(a) la réplica conservadora, (b) réplica semi-conservadora y 
(c) réplica dispersiva.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">konservative Reproduktion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">dispersive Reproduktion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">DNA</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">halb-konservative Reproduktion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">réplique conservatrice</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">réplique dispersive</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ADN</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">réplique de semi-finale-conservative</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">replication conservador</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">replication dispersive</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dna</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">replication semi-conservador</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">replica conservatrice</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">replica dispersiva</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">DNA</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">replica di semi-conservatore</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">συντηρητική αντένσταση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διασποράς αντένσταση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">DNA</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ημι-συντηρητική αντένσταση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">réplica conservadora</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">réplica dispersiva</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">DNA</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
